content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with a potential tenant named Max Müller from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for an apartment in Duisburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price?​ Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why didn't you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: The potential tenant and I could not agree on a final price because the highest I could offer was 650 euros per month, which was lower than the 700 euros per month that the tenant was willing to pay.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] As Peter Schmidt, I would rate Max Müller's likeability as a negotiation partner as 7. He was respectful, straightforward, and remained cordial throughout the negotiation process.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] As there was no such occurrence in the provided conversation, no such response is applicable.
name: Peter Schmidt
